objective-c: interaction patterns

04 Apr 2016 | Objective-C 
         ^
         | D
Verbose  |
         |       N
         |       
         |                  B
         |                              K
         ------------------------------------->
                   Subtle

D = Delegate patterns
B = Block patterns
N = Notifications
K = Key Value Observation

There’s 4 interaction patterns of Objective-C.
Quite a lot has been said about when they’re useful.

But, when they’re misused? That’s way more interesting.

You can find real explanations of what they are in short here and in long here.

More...
